FORM_DESIGN.HINT: Drag'n'Drop to reorder, drag from toolbar to create, drop to trash to delete.
FORM_DESIGN.NAME: Name
FORM_DESIGN.TRASH.CONFIRM: Are you sure to delete the field?

RESERVATION_FIELDS.HINT: Custom reservation fields are displayed in Make a New Reservation form, User Reservations, Reservation Report, Book It Now wizard, and Simple Reservation wizard.
RESERVATION_FIELDS.SHARED.HINT: These fields are shared among all reservation categories.
